name: Beetrooper Fly & Sting
text: When your opponent activates a monster effect , while you control a "Beetrooper" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. During your End Phase, if this card is in your GY and you control an Insect monster with 3000 or : You can banish 1 Insect monster from your GY; Set this card. You can only use 1 "Beetrooper Fly & Sting" effect per turn, and only once that turn .
